statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); short_cwd=$(echo "$cwd" | sed "s|^$HOME|~|"); git_branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // "unknown"'); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf '\033[1;36m%s\033[0m  \033[1;32m\033[0m \033[1;33m%s\033[0m  \033[1;35m%s\033[0m' "$short_cwd" "$git_branch" "$model"; else printf '\033[1;36m%s\033[0m  \033[1;35m%s\033[0m' "$short_cwd" "$model"; fi
